column4: After trying to upgrade to Precise Pangolin, now when I boot, I get this message "The system is rnning in low-graphics mode.  Your screen, graphics card, and input device settings could not be detected correctly.  You will need to configure these yourself"  I can ssh in just fine, but I have trouble seeing/using the desktop.
How do I configure my screen, video card, and input device from ssh?
Should be able to use nvidias tool to auto gen xorg.conf
